column4: i'm trying to compile ndiswrapper (even though i shouldn't need it) and i get this error: Makefile:35: *** Cannot find kernel version in /lib/modules/2.6.24-16-generic/build, is it configured?. Stop.
you need the kernel headers for your kernel (in other distro you would need the entire source tree)
how do i get those?
so, because you are not doing things the proper way, you could possible need the source tree
what is the proper way?
through the package manager, where you should get everything, including ndiswrapper
aptitude search kernel headers
aptitude install kernel-headers-`uname -r`
will that work without an internet connection?
no
